name: Binary Typer
description:
In this game you need to press 0 or 1 depending on the number that is shown at the front.  The numbers will pop up faster and faster and you need to keep the amount of numbers low or else you will loose. 

This was just a small game I made a few years ago that I just polished up a bit and made a Version for the PC to maybe get some feedback and update it later on if I get some new ideas.
